ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Contratos import CNContratoObjeto from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BreadcrumbEntityHandle, WesSiteMapNode
breadcrumbList = WesSiteMapNode.GetBreadcrumbEntityHandles() contrato = breadcrumbList.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("CN_CONTRATOOBJETOS"))
if (contrato.Handle != None): podeAlterar = CNContratoObjeto.VisibilidadeGridReajuste(contrato.Handle.Value) widget.Hidden = podeAlterar
